text: @LiberalVoiceThe ongoing war has had a devastating impact on Ukraine's energy sector, but despite the challenges, significant progress has been made in recent years. ğŸ’¡ğŸ’¥In 2014-2017, crucial laws were passed to align Ukraine's energy legislation with European standards, enhance energy security, and ensure financial sustainability. ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ’ªBut, Russia's threats persist, so Ukraine has worked tirelessly to achieve fully transparent energy markets, abolish household subsidies, and eliminate the state's role in the energy sector. ğŸ’°ğŸ Despite the odds, Ukraine has made remarkable strides in strengthening energy security and creating a more sustainable future.
